mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ibdata.TB_RESOLUTION (RESOLUTION_DATE, RESOLUTION_NUMBER, APPLICANT, APPLICATION_DEPARTMENT, APPLICATION_AMOUNT, SUMMARY, APPLICATION_CATEGORY, ELECTRONIC_PAYMENT_NUMBER) VALUES (#{resolutionDate}, #{resolutionNumber}, #{applicant}, #{applicationDepartment}, #{applicationAmount}, #{summary}, #{applicationCategory}, #{electronicPaymentNumber});

INSERT INTO ibdata.TB_RESOLUTION_DETAIL (RESOLUTION_DATE, RESOLUTION_NUMBER, RESOLUTION_TURN, USER, ACC_NUMBER, COST_CODE, BUDGET_YEAR, ANNUAL_NUMBER, RECEIPT, EXECUTION_AMOUNT, CARD_NUMBER, APPROVAL_NUMBER, CARD_COMPANY, BANK, ACCOUNT_HOLDER, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_NAME, CAUSE_ACTION_NUMBER) VALUES (#{resolutionDate}, #{resolutionNumber}, #{resolutionTurn}, #{user}, #{accNumber}, #{costCode}, #{budgetYear}, #{annualNumber}, #{receipt}, #{executionAmount}, #{cardNumber}, #{approvalNumber}, #{cardCompany}, #{bank}, #{accountHolder}, #{accountNumber}, #{customerName}, #{causeActionNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE ibdata.TB_RESOLUTION_DETAIL SET USER = #{user}, ACC_NUMBER = #{accNumber}, COST_CODE = #{costCode}, BUDGET_YEAR = #{budgetYear}, ANNUAL_NUMBER = #{annualNumber}, RECEIPT = #{receipt}, EXECUTION_AMOUNT = #{executionAmount}, CARD_NUMBER = #{cardNumber}, APPROVAL_NUMBER = #{approvalNumber}, CARD_COMPANY = #{cardCompany}, BANK = #{bank}, ACCOUNT_HOLDER = #{accountHolder}, ACCOUNT_NUMBER = #{accountNumber}, CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName}, CAUSE_ACTION_NUMBER = #{causeActionNumber} WHERE RESOLUTION_DATE = #{resolutionDate} AND RESOLUTION_NUMBER = #{resolutionNumber} RESOLUTION_TURN = #{resolutionTurn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ibdata.TB_RESOLUTION_DETAIL_ATTACHMENT (RESOLUTION_DATE, RESOLUTION_NUMBER, RESOLUTION_TURN, ATTACHMENT_CATEGORY) VALUES (#{resolutionDate}, #{resolutionNumber}, #{resolutionTurn}, #{attachmentCategory})
